author: fwyzard
body:
`DQMEDAnalyzer::endLuminosityBlock()` is now marked as `final` and calls `dqmEndLuminosityBlock()`.
Migrate all classes inheriting from `DQMEDAnalyzer` to use the method `dqmEndLuminosityBlock()`.

This is an intermediate step needed by the migration of the `DQMEDAnalyzer` from `stream` to `one` module.
title: Introduce a DQMEDAnalyzer::dqmEndLuminosityBlock() method
